overview: Estela is a young woman who enjoys life and knows how to have fun, like any of her friends, with an Artificial Intelligence operating system called 'TINA'. TINA is made so that it is able to live situations within a virtual reality where the consequences, supposedly, do not affect real life. This duality of realities intertwine when TINA offers Estela the possibility of downloading the latest system update, warning her that reality and the game will merge and thus, the experience will gain in immersion. Now, how close are we to ‘TINA’?
title: Tina
